import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Components/LoginPage/styles.css";import"./Components/MainPage/styles.css";import SignInForm from"./Components/LoginPage/Login";import SignUpForm from"./Components/SignupPage/signUp";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomePage=_ref=>{let{onLoginClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container landing-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Placement Tracker App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Track opportunities and manage applications with ease"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:()=>onLoginClick("signIn"),children:"Student Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:()=>onLoginClick("signIn"),children:"Placement Admin Login"})]})]});};export default function App(){const[view,setView]=useState("landing");// 'landing', 'signIn', 'signUp'
const containerClass="container "+(view==="signUp"?"right-panel-active":"");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:view==="landing"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{onLoginClick:setView}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:containerClass,id:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUpForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignInForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-panel overlay-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome Back!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"To keep connected with us please login with your personal info"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ghost",id:"signIn",onClick:()=>setView("signIn"),children:"Sign In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-panel overlay-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hello, Friend!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Enter your personal details and start journey with us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ghost",id:"signUp",onClick:()=>setView("signUp"),children:"Sign Up"})]})]})})]})});}
